speedrunnermod.the_easier_speedrunning_m: The sequal to the speedrunner mod, without any of the modded features.
item.speedrunnermod.speedrunner_ingot.to: Faster than iron, used to create
item.speedrunnermod.smithing_template.go: Add golden armor, weapon, or tool
item.speedrunnermod.speedrunner_bulk.too: Gives the player fire resistance and
water breathing, with a chance to give
item.speedrunnermod.eye_of_annul.tooltip: Gives the user the exact distance
of the nearest stronghold, in blocks.
Shift + right click to locate and teleport
item.speedrunnermod.boat.tooltip: A boat that can be ridden in lava.
item.speedrunnermod.wither_bone.tooltip: Used to craft a Wither Sword.
item.speedrunnermod.wither_sword.tooltip: a 100% drop rate for a wither skeleton skull.
item.speedrunnermod.dragons_sword.doom_m: Haha... you thought. Not on doom mode!
item.speedrunnermod.dragons_sword.failed: Haha... you thought that would work. To easy for doom mode! >:)
item.speedrunnermod.dragons_pearl.toolti: Right-click to perch the Ender Dragon!
item.speedrunnermod.piglin_awakener.tool: Teleport nearby piglins to the player!
item.speedrunnermod.blaze_spotter.toolti: Teleport to the nearest blaze spawner!
item.speedrunnermod.blaze_spotter.confir: Do you wish to teleport to the blaze spawner? Right click to confirm.
item.speedrunnermod.blaze_spotter.wrong_: You must be in the nether to use this item!
item.speedrunnermod.piglin_awakener.conf: Do you wish to teleport summon nearby piglin? Right click to confirm.
item.speedrunnermod.piglin_awakener.wron: You must be in the nether to use this item!
item.speedrunnermod.piglin_awakener.unsa: Piglins say... no gold armor, no rally! >:(
item.speedrunnermod.piglin_awakener.no_g: Piglins say... where's the gold at?
item.speedrunnermod.piglin_awakener_craf: Can be used to craft the piglin awakener item.
item.speedrunnermod.raid_eradicator.conf: Do you wish to kill all nearby raider entities? Right click to confirm.
item.speedrunnermod.raid_eradicator.coul: Couldn't find any nearby raider entities.
item.speedrunnermod.ender_thruster.confi: Do you wish to teleport to the surface? Right click to confirm.
item.speedrunnermod.ender_thruster.wrong: You can't use this item in the nether.
item.speedrunnermod.ender_thruster.could: Couldn't teleport, Y-level is already the same.
item.speedrunnermod.dragons_pearl.cannot: Couldn't find dragon within reasonable distance.
item.speedrunnermod.dragons_pearl.wrong_: You must be in the end to use this item!
item.speedrunnermod.eye_of_annul.doom_mo: Haha... that doesn't work on doom mode! >:)
item.speedrunnermod.eye_of_annul.confirm: Do you wish to teleport to the portal room? Right-click to confirm.
item.speedrunnermod.eye_of_annul.wrong_d: You must be in the overworld to use this item!
item.speedrunnermod.eye_of_annul.no_ende: The gatekeeper requests an ender eye.
The gatekeeper requests an ender pearl.
item.speedrunnermod.eye_of_annul.has_non: The gatekeeper says... bring me what I need, and I will let you through.
item.speedrunnermod.eye_of_inferno.looki: Eye of Inferno is now looking for a %s!
item.speedrunnermod.eye_of_inferno.wrong: You must be in the nether to use this item!
item.speedrunnermod.speedrunners_eye.blo: The nearest %s is %s blocks away. (may not be perfectly accurate)
item.speedrunnermod.speedrunners_eye.wro: You must be in the overworld to use this item!
speedrunnermod.levels_needed: You need at least %s level(s) to perform this action.
enchantment.speedrunnermod.cooldown.tool: §lCooldown§r lowers the cooldown on certain items.
advancements.speedrunnermod.title: Speedrunner Mod
advancements.speedrunnermod.description: The mod that makes speedrunning, easier
advancements.speedrunnermod.speedrunning: Obtain a Speedrunner Ingot. It's iron, but better
advancements.speedrunnermod.wasteland.de: Set afoot in the Speedrunner's Wasteland biome
advancements.speedrunnermod.suited_for_s: Protect yourself with a piece of speedrunner armor
advancements.speedrunnermod.perch_alread: Obtain a Dragon's pearl, an item used to force the ender dragon perch.
advancements.speedrunnermod.one_hit_one_: Obtain the Dragon's sword, a weapon used to kill the ender dragon in one hit.
advancements.speedrunnermod.bulked.title: Bulked
advancements.speedrunnermod.raid_eradica: Obtain a Raid Eradicator, an item used to kill all nearby raider entities.
advancements.speedrunnermod.ender_thrust: Obtain an Ender Thruster, an item used to teleport to the surface.
advancements.speedrunnermod.piglin_rally: Obtain the Piglin Awakener, an item that can teleport nearby piglins towards the player.
advancements.speedrunnermod.goliath.desc: Conquer doom mode, and kill the all-powerful giant.
advancements.speedrunnermod.deep_dark.de: Slay Minecraft's most difficult boss, the warden.
speedrunnermod.title: Speedrunner Mod
speedrunnermod.options.error.line1: The Speedrunner Mod has detected invalid or broken options.
speedrunnermod.options.error.line2: Would you like to fix these options to prevent any futher issues?
speedrunnermod.leaderboards.restart.line: Some of your set options go against the §a§lleaderboards criteria.
You can view the specific options by clicking the button below, and fix them by pressing "Fix and Restart".
Would you like to proceed? For more info, visit the §lleaderboards submission page.
speedrunnermod.leaderboards.restart_requ: You will need to restart your game to fully apply the §a§lleaderboards mode§r §aoption.
speedrunnermod.leaderboards.action_neede: You have certain options that go against the §c§lleaderboard criteria.
speedrunnermod.leaderboards_mode_disable: You need to enable the Leaderboards Mode option to be able to submit speedruns to the leaderboards.
speedrunnermod.cannot_submit_speedrun.to: You cannot submit any speedruns to the leaderboards, because your options go against the §c§lleaderboards criteria.
speedrunnermod.leaderboards.ineligible_o: The §b§lSpeedrunner Mod§r has detected §c§linvalid§r §cand§r §c§lineligible§r §coptions§r for §aspeedrunning the leaderboards.
Would you like to fix these options, so that you can proceed with leaderboard submissions?
For more info, visit the §lleaderboards submission page.
speedrunnermod.leaderboards.ineligible.l: Changes you made go against the §bspeedrunner mod§r §aleaderboards criteria.
If you would still like to submit speedruns to the leaderboards, you will need to revert your changes.
speedrunnermod.restart_now.tooltip: Restart the game to fully apply the §lleaderboards mode,§r so you can begin submitting your speedruns.
speedrunnermod.fix_and_restart.tooltip: Fix the options and close the game. You will need to manually re-open the game to apply changes.
speedrunnermod.revert_changes.tooltip: Revert your changes to keep leaderboard eligibility.
speedrunnermod.download_and_install.tool: Download and install the SpeedrunIGT mod, to be eligible for leaderboard submissions.
speedrunnermod.speedrun_igt_missing.line: The §aSpeedrunIGT§r mod is §lrequired§r in order to submit speedruns to the leaderboards.
You must download and install this mod, or disable leaderboards mode.
speedrunnermod.close_game.tooltip: Don't make any changes and close the game.
speedrunnermod.disable_leaderboards_mode: Disable §lleaderboards mode,§r and close the game. This will mean you will §lnot§r be eligible for any leaderboard submissions until you re-enable.
speedrunnermod.proceed_anyway.tooltip: Ignore errors and proceed anyway. This could cause issues, so be aware!
speedrunnermod.ignore.tooltip: Ignore ineligible options and proceed anyway. You will not be able to submit any leaderboard runs until you re-enable.
speedrunnermod.ignore_restart.tooltip: Ignore restarting your game and proceed anyway. You will not be able to submit any leaderboard runs until your game is restarted.
speedrunnermod.leaderboards.ineligible_o: §lStructure Spawn Rates§r = %s, must be §2Very Common,§r §aCommon,§r or §eNormal.
speedrunnermod.title.options.tooltip: Open the Speedrunner Mod's options page...
speedrunnermod.options.structure_spawn_r:
Change how often structures spawn.

§c§lWarning:§r Higher spawn rates may cause lag and increase load time.

§e§lRequires world reload.
speedrunnermod.options.better_biomes.too: Allows certain biomes, such as plains, deserts, savannas, etc. to generate more commonly.
speedrunnermod.options.item_tooltips.too: Adds helpful tooltips to certain items.
Adds tooltips to items who's texture was not created by the creator of this mod.
speedrunnermod.options.icarus_mode.toolt: Grants the player with an §lElytra§r and §lfirework rockets§r upon world creation.
speedrunnermod.options.infini_pearl_mode: Grants the player with an §9ender pearl§r that does not get consumed or inflict damage upon use.
speedrunnermod.options.leaderboards_mode:
Enable this if you want to begin submitting speedruns to the speedrunner mod leaderboards.§r

If you don't, your runs will §lnot§r be eligible.
speedrunnermod.options.faster_block_brea: Allows certain blocks to be broken more quickly.
speedrunnermod.options.block_breaking_mu: Double/triple the speed at which blocks can be broken.
speedrunnermod.options.kill_ghast_on_fir: This does exactly what it says it does.
speedrunnermod.options.dragon_perch_time: Make the ender dragon automatically perch upon entering the end.
speedrunnermod.options.better_villager_t:
Improves the vanilla Minecraft villager trades.

§a§lRequires restart.
speedrunnermod.options.throwable_firebal:
Allows fire charges to be thrown into fireballs.

§a§lRequires restart.
speedrunnermod.options.max_item_count.to:
Sets the maximum stack amount for §lmost§r items.

§c§lWarning:§r This can be buggy.
speedrunnermod.options.faster_spawners.t: Increases the rate at which mobs spawner from spawner blocks.
speedrunnermod.options.mob_spawning_rate:
Controls how often passive mobs spawn.

§e§lRequires world reload.
speedrunnermod.options.custom_biomes_and: Custom Biomes And Custom Biome Features

Allows the §b"Speedrunner Wasteland"§r biome to generate, and allows additional worldgen features to be added to different biomes.

§a§lRequires restart.
speedrunnermod.options.common_ores.toolt:
Makes certain ores generate more commonly.

§e§lRequires world reload.
speedrunnermod.options.lava_boats.toolti: Allows the §bspeedrunner,§r §ccrimson§r and §9warped§r boats to be ridden in lava.
speedrunnermod.options.nether_water.tool: Allows water to be placed in the nether.
speedrunnermod.options.generate_speedrun:
Allows §bspeedrunner trees§r to generate throughout the world.

§a§lRequires restart.
speedrunnermod.options.better_foods.tool: Improves saturation and refilled hunger with food items.
speedrunnermod.options.stronghold_distan:
Changes how far §lfrom spawn§r strongholds can generate.

§a§lRequires restart.
speedrunnermod.options.stronghold_spread:
Changes how §lfar apart§r strongholds can generate.

§a§lRequires restart.
Set the maximum amount of strongholds that can generate per world.

§a§lRequires restart.
speedrunnermod.options.stronghold_portal:
Sets the maximum amount of portal rooms that can generate per stronghold.

§lNote:§r Regardless of this number, it will always be §lone§r on §cdoom mode.

§a§lRequires restart.
speedrunnermod.options.stronghold_librar:
Sets the total amount of libraries that can generate per stronghold.

§lNote:§r If §cdoom mode§r is on, this number will be §ldoubled (x2)§r, and cannot be set higher than §l5.

§a§lRequires restart.
speedrunnermod.options.nether_portal_coo: Set the amount of time it takes for players to enter/exit the nether.
speedrunnermod.options.global_nether_por: Allows nether portals to be created across §lall§r dimensions, including the end.
speedrunnermod.options.better_anvil.tool: Removes the "§lToo Expensive§r" feature, and lowers the cost.
Set the maximum cost that is allowed when using an anvil.
speedrunnermod.options.higher_enchantmen: Allows you to combine two enchanted items, with the default maximum enchantment level, and go beyond it.
speedrunnermod.options.higher_breath_tim: Allows the player to hold their breath for a longer period of time underwater, and quicker regain when exiting the water.
speedrunnermod.options.stack_unstackable:
Allows certain unstackable items to be stacked.

§a§lRequires restart.
speedrunnermod.options.kinetic_damage.to: Enable/disable the damage from flying into walls.
speedrunnermod.options.arrows_destroy_be: Shoot an arrow at a bed in the end, and watch it explode.
speedrunnermod.options.custom_data_gener:
This allows all world modifications to be applied, which includes making structures more common, modifying mob/creature spawn rates, doom mode features, and more.

§e§lRequires world reload.
speedrunnermod.options.fast_world_creati: Allows creation of worlds with just a single click.
speedrunnermod.options.gamemode.tooltip: Set the gamemode when creating a world.
speedrunnermod.options.difficulty.toolti: Set the difficulty when creating a world.
speedrunnermod.options.allow_cheats.tool: Enable cheats when creating a world.
speedrunnermod.options.fog.tooltip: Get rid of that annoying fog!
speedrunnermod.options.panorama.tooltip:
Change the background image on the title screen.

§a§lRequires restart.
speedrunnermod.options.mod_button_type.t:
Change the option button type for the speedrunner mod.
Logo = small, squared button with mod logo.
Button = large, rectangular button.
speedrunnermod.options.item_messages.too: Choose whether certain messages are sent to the §lchat§r or the §lactionbar§r (located above your hotbar).
speedrunnermod.options.social_buttons.to: Enable/disable the external link buttons across different screens.
Sends the players coordinates to chat upon death, and displays them on the death screen.
Enable/disable the confirmation messages when using certain items (ex. eye of annul, ender thruster, piglin awakener, etc.).
speedrunnermod.reset_options_confirm: Are you sure you want to reset the Speedrunner Mod settings back to default?
You may need to restart your game for changes to take full effect. Continue?
speedrunnermod.restart_required.line1: Changes you made will require a restart to take full effect.
speedrunnermod.menu.features.tooltip: View a list of multiple pages, containing a bunch of features that this mod includes!
speedrunnermod.features.blocks_and_items: Obtained from §bspeedrunner ores§f that generate around the world, and loot chests. This can be used to craft the §bspeedrunner armor, tools and weapons,§f and also acts as an §liron ingot§r§f in any crafting recipe.
Found in loot chests and from §cnether speedrunner ores.§f These can be crafted using §b9 speedrunner ingots,§f and also acts as an §liron nugget§r§f in any crafting recipe.
Found in bastion chests and crafted using §b9 speedrunner ingots.§f Acts as an §liron block§r§f in all crafting recipes.

A new type of wood, which can be found across all biomes in the overworld, as well as in the newly added biome, the §b§lSpeedrunner's Wasteland.§r§f The §bspeedrunner wood§f acts like any other type of wood, like being able to be used as a §lfuel source,§r but it §6doesn't burn from fire or lava.

Found deserts, badlands, and soul sand valleys, the §bdead speedrunner wood§r acts pretty much like normal wood. Used to craft normal sticks, burns longer than the normal speedrunner wood in a furnace, and has a different style.
Along with the §bspeedrunner boat,§r there are now also §ccrimson§r and §9warped§r boats. They can be crafted just like any ordinary boat, and can also be used in lava.

These can only be obtained from the §lIgneous Ores§r that generate around the world, and can only be used for one thing: §ocrafting obsidian.§r If you're ever having trouble obtaining obsidian, just look for these ores around the world, and you can get some obsidian just like that.

The §ceye of inferno§r acts like an §aeye of ender,§r but different. Instead of locating the nearest stronghold, it locates the nearest §cnether fortress,§r or §7bastion,§r it's your choice. Just shift and right-click to swap between the two structures.

The §deye of annul§r also acts just like an §aeye of ender,§r but in addition, it tells you the §oexact distance§r of the nearest stronghold, in blocks. If you §lshift + right click,§r you can teleport directly to the closest stronghold portal room.
The §ddragon's pearl§r can be used to §lforce the ender dragon§r to instantly perch, in case you miss the §ldragon perch time§r perch. Makes the end fight much faster!

The §6piglin awakener§r is an interesting one. Have you ever been in the nether, and you just can't find any piglin? Well, this item solves this. Upon §lright-clicking,§r nearby piglin will be §lteleported,§r or awakened, to the player. You can craft this item with 8 gold ingots surrounding an §9ender pearl,§r §6golden apple,§r or §eblaze powder.

The §6blaze spotter§r is a goofy item that will teleport the player to the nearest blaze spawner. It will also check for air blocks §labove§r the blaze spawner, to ensure that the player is safe to teleport. If it isn't air, the game will replace those blocks with air.
The §9ender thruster§r item can be used to §lteleport to the surface.§r This can be especially useful when underground, or coming out of the nether and spawning in a cave.
Acts just like an §aeye of ender,§r but only locates overworld structures such as §6villages,§r §druined portals,§r §eshipwrecks,§r §9ocean monuments,§r §6woodland mansions§r and §6desert temples.

With this item, you can kill all nearby raider entities in just one click. Witches will not be killed, but instead teleported to the player. However, this comes at the cost of a totem of undying, a long with the player's maximum health. Upon use, the player will be deducted their maximum health (can be reduced with protection), and use their totem. The item will not work if the player does not have a totem equipped.

Found only in loot chests, the §bspeedrunner bulk§r is a very powerful food item that gives §6fire resistance§r and §9water breathing,§r and also has a chance to give §bspeed, §ehaste,§r and §cregeneration§r when eaten.

Crafted with §b2 speedrunner ingots§r and §b4 speedrunner planks,§r the §bSpeedrunner Workbench§r acts just like a smithing table, but is also the job site block for a §rRetired Speedrunner villager. You can also use this block to transfer enchantments to other items!

The §b§lRetired Speedrunner§r is a new villager profession, whom offers some very good trades, for very cheap prices. It will sell things like ender pearls, overpowered enchanted books, and other and other helpful combat items, to make speedrunning the game easier.

Crafted from §68 gold nuggets§r and the respective food item, these powerful foods give the player §lmore saturation§r and §lhunger§r than the original food would. To read about more features, refer to the buttons below.
The §bspeedrunner armor§r acts almost like iron armor, but slightly more powerful. It applies more protection and has more durability, and can be crafted just like any other armor piece would, using §bspeedrunner ingots.
This is basically an upgrade for the normal §6golden armor.§r It has more durability than normal gold, it's faster than normal gold, and it can §lkeep you safe from piglin.
§bSpeedrunner boots§r (or §6golden speedrunner boots)§r can be worn by the player, giving infinite speed, and protects the player from sensing off §bsculk sensor blocks.

The dragon's sword,§r crafted with a §bspeedrunner sword§r and a §ddragon's pearl,§r this weapon can be used to instantly kill the ender dragon in just one hit. cIf you're on§r §l§cdoom mode,§r §cthen good luck with that.

A new modded enchantment, which can be found in various loot chests, and through piglin bartering, the §bDash§r enchantment drastically increases the players speed, by giving them the speed effect. This enchantment can only be applied to boots.
This enchantment decreases the cooldown on certain items, such as ender pearls, shields, and chorus fruit. Can be found via various loot chests.

Crafted with §ltwo wither bones§r and a §bspeedrunner stick,§r this weapon can one-shot wither skeletons, and will make them §lalways§r drop a wither skeleton skull. §l§7Wither bones§r can be §lcrafted§r with §ltwo bones§r and §ltwo pieces of coal.§r
speedrunnermod.features.ores_and_worldge: This biome will generate commonly throughout the overworld, a great place for speedrunning, because mobs spawn less (except for enderman), diamonds generate more commonly, and of course, this is where you find the §bspeedrunner trees.§r If you ever want to feel safe while speedrunning, this is the perfect place to go.

Found across all biomes in the overworld and the nether, the speedrunner ores can be used to craft all of the speedrunner tools, blocks, and armor, and can also be found more commonly in the §bSpeedrunner's Wasteland§r biome. Ingots and nuggets can also be found in loot chests.
Found across all biomes in the overworld and the nether, the experience ores will drop a §lbunch of experience§r when mined, allowing the player to enchant items with ease.
Found across all biomes in the overworld and the nether, §7igneous ores§r drop §7igneous rocks,§r which you already know can be used to craft obsidian, making getting to the nether much easier!

That's right, ores of all types generate more commonly throughout the world. This includes iron, diamonds, speedrunner ores, redstone, lapis, and everything else! Now you can get stacked items, in just a few minutes!
Structures of almost all types will generate more commonly! No more searching for the buried bastions and far away nether fortresses. §o(This can be disabled in the §b§ospeedrunner mod options menu).

These so important structures have been changed with this mod, to make navigating them much easier. Nether fortresses are much smaller now, and contain more than 2 blaze spawners per fortress. Treasure bastions will now generate with a §6blaze spawner§r at the bottom, instead of magma cubes. Finally, strongholds are much smaller, each containing more than 1 portal room.
speedrunnermod.features.doom_mode.basics: Doom mode is a special hard-coded mode, which makes the game extremely difficult to beat. Mobs have more health, speed, and do more damage. §lEverything else§r does basically double damage, and upon entering the end, not only will an §dEnder Dragon§r spawn, but along with a §7wither§r and a §agiant.
speedrunnermod.features.doom_mode.bosses: When the end fight begins, the §dender dragon§r will spawn like normal, but with §cquintuple§r the amount of health. A §7wither§r will also spawn, with almost double the amount of health. All withers also regenerate extremely fast. And finally, a §a§lgiant§r will spawn. In vanilla Minecraft, the §agiant§r does not have any AI. However, this mode §lgives it§r a function.
The §a§lGiant§r will target anything in it's path, and slowly regenerate at all times. It cannot be killed from the void. If it gets knocked into the void, it will simply teleport back to the middle of the end island. Once the giant reaches half health, ranged weapons are no good. The giant will also randomly spawn §c§lTNT§r around itself when taking damage, so watch out for that. The giant is completely immune to explosives, fall damage, fire and lava damage. Good luck with this boss. §a>:)
speedrunnermod.features.doom_mode.doom_b: The doom blocks will generate in the end, and if broken, they will spawn various hostile mobs, along with some lava. You can avoid these things if you break these blocks with a speedrunner or golden speedrunner tool. However, they will also drop a variety of helpful items to make the end fight a little bit easier, including armor, crossbows, etc.
speedrunnermod.features.doom_mode.other_: §cHostile mobs§r inflict the player with §7slowness§r when attacking, and skeletons shoot §9slowness arrows. Ghasts shoot §9fireballs§r at an extremely fast rate, right-clicking a §acreeper§r with a flint and steel will make it §linstantly explode,§r end crystals do more damage, §9ender pearls§r give §lblindness§r upon use, §aender eyes§f will always break, §lstrongholds are extremely large,§f and generate close to the bottom of the world. §c§oIf you're up for the challenge, I wish you luck.
speedrunnermod.features.miscellaneous.re: Automatically create a new world in the press of a button, the default key is §l"R".§r You can set this to whatever you'd like in the §l"Controls"§r menu.
speedrunnermod.features.miscellaneous.fo: Automatically enable/disable Minecraft's distant fog in the press of a button, default key is §l"H".§r You can also change this to whatever you'd like in the §l"Controls"§r menu.
speedrunnermod.features.miscellaneous.fu: Instantly set your brightness to 1000% to see in the dark caves, especially useful when trying to spot things in dark areas. Default key is §l"O".§r You can change this to whatever you'd like in the §l"Controls"§r menu.
speedrunnermod.features.miscellaneous.fa: Certain blocks can be broken at a much faster rate, including wood, stone, ores, netherrack, end stone, and much more! §o(This can be disabled in the §b§ospeedrunner mod options menu).
speedrunnermod.features.miscellaneous.ic: Give yourself a head start with an §lunbreakable elytra§r and a §lstack§r of §lfirework rockets!§r You can enable this feature through the §bspeedrunner mod options menu.
speedrunnermod.features.miscellaneous.in: Give yourself an ender pearl that causes no damage and lasts forever everytime you create a new world. You can enable this feature through the §bspeedrunner mod options menu.
speedrunnermod.features.miscellaneous.pi: Piglin bartering is §lEXTREMELY overpowered.§r Ender pearls are much more common, along with some other useful items, and they can even give you golden apples! :0
Minecraft left the piglins out, so I took care of that. Upon death, piglins will drop piglin pork, which is basically an alternative for porkchop.
speedrunnermod.features.miscellaneous.no: Screw these guys... §o§cUnless you're on doom mode...
speedrunnermod.features.miscellaneous.tr: Everything drops x3 more than it would normally drop. This includes ore experience, mob experience, mob drops, and more!
speedrunnermod.features.miscellaneous.mo: This in-game menu only scratches the surface of what this mod has to offer, So if you want to view a list of §oALL§r of the features, refer to the button below!
speedrunnermod.title.resources.mods.sodi: A mod that improves the frame rate and fixes graphical issues.
speedrunnermod.title.resources.mods.lith: Another mod that improves the games performance.
speedrunnermod.title.resources.mods.phos: A mod that saves CPU usage and optimizes Minecraft's lightning engine.
speedrunnermod.title.resources.mods.kryp: A mod that optimizes Minecraft's networking stack.
Learn the different types of bastions, and how to navigate them.
Learn how to properly navigate through nether fortresses.
Learn how to find structures through walls.
Learn how to "blind travel" to the nearest stronghold.
Learn how to kill the ender dragon in one cycle.
Learn how to use the "pie chart" to find nearby structures.
Learn how to locate a buried treasure without a map!
Check out this video by "Penny" to learn some more.
speedrunnermod.menu.external.discord.too: Join the §9§lDiscord§r server for more exciting stuff.
speedrunnermod.menu.title_screen.externa: Learn some more about this mod.
speedrunnermod.dillon8775_youtube.toolti: Check out the creator of this mod, §lDillon8775 §r(me)! :)
speedrunnermod.mannyqueso_youtube.toolti: Check out the creator of some of these textures, §6§lMannyQUESO! §r:)
speedrunnermod.nuzland_youtube.tooltip: Check out my other friend's channel, §b§lNuzLand! §r:)
speedrunnermod.doom_mode_screen.line2: I don't think you understand what you're doing.
speedrunnermod.doom_mode_screen.line3: Okay, fine. You want to understand §cDoom Mode?
speedrunnermod.doom_mode_screen.line5: The end fight... well good luck with that.
speedrunnermod.doom_mode_screen.line6: But most importantly... expect the unexpected.
speedrunnermod.doom_mode_screen.line8: There's nothing else to it, so beat it!
speedrunnermod.doom_mode_screen.line10: Ok fine, you want to know all the secrets?
speedrunnermod.doom_mode_screen.line11: A giant and a wither spawn in the end.
speedrunnermod.doom_mode_screen.line12: They all have an extremely high amount of health, including the ender dragon.
speedrunnermod.doom_mode_screen.line13: So... I suggest you get the maximum amount of protection you can get.
speedrunnermod.doom_mode_screen.line14: Oh yeah, ender eyes always break and ender pearls give blindness.
speedrunnermod.create_world_button.desc: Press to automatically create a new world!
speedrunnermod.create_world_button.disab: Turn on "§lFast World Creation§r" to use this feature.
